entries.title: Bi-Lighting Music Note
entries.description: A music note with a drop shadow and a gradient from purple to magenta, also known as 'bi-lighting' due to it matching the colours of the bisexual flag. Fun fact: this was the very first asset uploaded

entries.title: Behaviour Tree Icons
entries.description: A small collection of SVG icons that I personally use for behaviour tree nodes. Some may be useful outside of the context of behaviour trees as well.
